overview: Prissy blond twink, Joey J, is too busy gossiping on his phone to move his car when his neighbor kindly asks him to. A little later he gets a lewd call from the creeper and dares him to try to get into his house. Creeper gets in and, surprise, it's the neighbor and he's there to discipline this bratty boy. Creeper ties Joey up and subjects him to head dunking, plastic bag suffocation, and cruel orgasm denial. Creeper then brutally fucks his mouth and ass and sprays him with a huge facial cumshot.
title: Bad Neighbor Disciplined
